verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> has he made <S%G5607>alive<s%>, who were <S%G3498>dead<s%> in <S%G3900>trespasses<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>;

<S%G3739>Where<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> times <S%G4218>past<s%> you <S%G4043>walked<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G165>course<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1849>power<s%> of the <S%G109>air<s%>, the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1754>works<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience<s%>:

<S%G1722>Among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G390>lived<s%> in times <S%G4218>past<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G4160>fulfilling<s%> the <S%G2307>desires<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G1271>mind<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1510>were<s%> by <S%G5449>nature<s%> the <S%G5043>sons<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3062>others<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, who <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%>, <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>,

<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G5607>when<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> in <S%G3900>sins<s%>, has made us alive together <S%G4806>with<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, (by <S%G5485>grace<s%> you <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G4982>saved<s%>;)

<S%G2532>And<s%> has <S%G4891>raised<s%> us up <S%G4891>together<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4776>made<s%> us sit <S%G4776>together<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> places <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>:

<S%G2443>That<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G165>ages<s%> to <S%G1904>come<s%> he might <S%G1731>show<s%> the <S%G5235>exceeding<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G5544>kindness<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> by <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> you <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>yourselves<s%>: it is the <S%G1435>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>:
<S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2443>works<s%>, <S%G3361>lest<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> should <S%G2744>boast<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4161>workmanship<s%>, <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has before <S%G4282>ordained<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we should <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G3421>remember<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> being in time <S%G4218>past<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, who <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G203>Uncircumcision<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G4061>Circumcision<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> made by <S%G5499>hands<s%>;

<S%G3754>That<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> you <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5565>outside<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, being <S%G526>aliens<s%> from the <S%G4174>commonwealth<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3581>strangers<s%> from the <S%G1242>covenants<s%> of <S%G1860>promise<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> without <S%G112>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4218>sometimes<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> far <S%G3112>off<s%> are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> has <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> has broken <S%G3089>down<s%> the middle <S%G3320>wall<s%> of partition between <S%G5418>us<s%>;

Having <S%G2673>abolished<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> the <S%G2189>enmity<s%>, even the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1785>commandments<s%> contained <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1378>ordinances<s%>; <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2936>make<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, so <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> might <S%G604>reconcile<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4716>cross<s%>, having <S%G615>slain<s%> the <S%G2189>enmity<s%> <S%G1722>thereby<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> which <S%G3588>were<s%> afar <S%G3112>off<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to them that <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2192>we<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4318>access<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>.

<S%G3767>Now<s%> <S%G686>therefore<s%> you <S%G2075>are<s%> no <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G3581>strangers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3941>foreigners<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4847>fellowcitizens<s%> with the <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G3609>household<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;

And are <S%G2026>built<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> the chief corner <S%G204>stone<s%>;

<S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3619>building<s%> fitly framed <S%G4883>together<s%> <S%G837>grows<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>:

<S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> are built <S%G4925>together<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G2732>habitation<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.
